response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This item is worth $1,200,000 to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its significance and the benefits it could bring to you, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This is a limited-time offer, designed to ensure you have the best possible deal while securing this remarkable item for your collection or use. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1100000}
